  • Method Details

    • move

      void move​(Direction direction, int cost, int mapWidth, int mapHeight)
      Change animals position in one of eight directions
      Parameters:
      direction - direction in which animal moves
      cost - quantity of energy which is subtracted from animal energy when moves
      mapWidth - map width
      mapHeight - map height

    • rotate

      void rotate​(Direction direction)
      Rotates animal in given direction
      Parameters:
      direction - direction in which animal rotates

    • breed

      Animal breed​(Animal partner)
      Creates animals child basing on its and partners params
      Parameters:
      partner - second animal to base child animal params on it
      Returns:
      returns new animal

    • eat

      void eat​(int grassEnergy)
      Increases animals energy by given value
      Parameters:
